name: clerk-convex-starter
title: Clerk + Convex Starter
description: One-step Clerk authentication and Convex backend setup with a polished landing experience.

files.content:
# Clerk Authentication
# Get these from https://dashboard.clerk.com
NEXT_PUBLIC_CLERK_PUBLISHABLE_KEY=pk_test_...
CLERK_SECRET_KEY=sk_test_...

# Clerk JWT issuer domain (from the Convex-specific JWT template)
# In development: https://verb-noun-00.clerk.accounts.dev
# In production: https://clerk.<your-domain>.com
CLERK_JWT_ISSUER_DOMAIN=https://your-app.clerk.accounts.dev

# Convex requires the Clerk JWT template audience to be "convex"
# Set this when configuring your Clerk JWT template:
# {
#   "aud": "convex"
# }

# Convex
# Get this from https://dashboard.convex.dev
NEXT_PUBLIC_CONVEX_URL=https://your-deployment.convex.cloud
